channel.title: Probably a Podcast
channel.itunes:summary: Shannon Ford isn't here to inspire you or help you better yourself in any way... but she can guarantee you'll laugh.. either with her or at her. She covers everything from her year-long stint as a reality TV "villain" to pop culture to what happens when you have everything in your life going great and then the bottom drops out and you gotta figure it the fuck out. Buckle up and come along for the ride as she tries to navigate being hella alone in her 20's.
channel.itunes:author: Dear Media
channel.description: Shannon Ford isn't here to inspire you or help you better yourself in any way... but she can guarantee you'll laugh.. either with her or at her. She covers everything from her year-long stint as a reality TV "villain" to pop culture to what happens when you have everything in your life going great and then the bottom drops out and you gotta figure it the fuck out. Buckle up and come along for the ride as she tries to navigate being hella alone in her 20's.

item.title: Ep 37: Probably Halloween feat. Anna Grace Newell
item.description:
It was truly a surprise for all of us: Probably Halloween! Anna Grace and Shannon are here in full costume to update you on all things boof squad. They discuss their viral, slightly insane, halloween costumes of past years and how they’ve just always been committed to the bit. AG talks about her new podcast, AG University, where she helps listeners build confidence and connect with their intuition and best self. Why did Anna Grace almost get choked out by a snake? What is Shannon’s scary recurring dream? …And what was that loud noise? It’s Probably Halloween.

Produced by Dear Media.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Ep 36: London Boy feat. James Middleton (Part 2)
item.description:
Back again this week, Shannon and James change outfits and pick up where they left off. With one week left in his trip, Shannon asks James about American stereotypes and if it’s everything he was expecting. They talk about their ideal first dates, toxic masculinity, and red flags. What are their pet peeves of each other? What was their spicy experience at Carbone? Don’t miss a guest appearance from your favorite boof squad member and, of course, a proper lesson in UK English vs. USA English. Enjoy London Boy Part 2.

Produced by Dear Media.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Ep 35: London Boy feat. James Middleton (Part 1)
item.itunes:title: Ep 35: London Boy feat. James Middleton (Part 1)
item.description:
A guest you’ve been waiting for since last season: Barcelona has landed in the US in the flesh, it is James Middleton himself. Personal trainer and coach (and Shannon’s boyfriend), James, sits down with Shannon and gives us his story of how they met that fateful night. What does James think of Shannon’s friends so far? How is their long-distance relationship going? Who is moving where? They exchange first impressions of each other and compare words that have shockingly different meanings in their home countries. Where are they going together next? All of this and lots of other cute stuff in episode 35 (part 1 of 2).

 

Produced by Dear Media.

item.title: Ep 34: Not Funny Guy feat. John Crist
item.itunes:title: Ep 34: Not Funny Guy feat. John Crist
item.description:
This week’s episode is the mashup you never saw coming: Shannon Ford and John Crist. John reminds Shannon about their first interaction and the first thing she said to him. They clear up the dating rumors and talk about their current long-distance relationships and internet shit-talkers. They discuss social media and what they post vs. what should stay in the group chat. John opens up about getting canceled and the impact it had on his career. He’s A funny guy, but not THE funny guy, hear about their unexpected friendship in episode 34.

Produced by Dear Media

He’s A funny guy, but not THE funny guy, hear about their unexpected friendship in episode 34. Produced by Dear Media

item.title: Ep 33: We’re Millennials feat. Jennica Thompson
item.itunes:title: Ep 33: We’re Millennials feat. Jennica Thompson
item.description: We’re back this week with another one of Shannon’s closest friends and YouTube superstar, Jennica Thompson. From her journey as a teen mom to her current role as a hot mom, Jennica talks about the climb to where she is now. The girls talk about being millennials and OG Facebook photo dumps. Why does Jennica know so much about caskets? How does she feel about co-parenting? What is up with her colon? Shannon asks Jennica about her fabulous style and they recap her 30th birthday in Cabo, and they even chat about their beef from Very Cavallari, all in episode 33.

item.title: Ep 32: We're Growing Up feat. Anna Grace Newell
item.itunes:title: Ep 32: We're Growing Up feat. Anna Grace Newell
item.description: Your favorite boof squad is back together for a reunion! Shannon and AG chat about where they are now and how the last year has been full of unexpected, yet wonderful, plot twists. The girls are growing up AG is officially a Florida mermaid gurliepop and living her best life. She also shares a surprise celebration and announcement! American girl dolls, dolphin assisted births, ambulance rides, they talk about it all in episode 32.

item.title: Ep 31: Catch Flights and Feelings
item.itunes:title: Ep 31: Catch Flights and Feelings
item.description: Probably A Podcast is back for a new season and Shannon is here to update you on her life and travels. The plane they take from Nashville to London? Not a vibe, but she made it to James’ family trip to Portugal. She discusses how long distance is affecting her and if it’s changed since her relationship first started. Did she tan topless when she found out who thinks tan lines are tacky? Is James going to come visit the US? What the fuck is Dey House? Where is she going next? Listen to episode 31 and find out all of this and more.

item.title: Ep 30: You're Ginger, Grow Up (Mini Episode)
item.itunes:title: Ep 30: You're Ginger, Grow Up (Mini Episode)
item.description: While Shannon finalizes plans for season 3, a loootttt has been going on. A mini life update was simply necessary, she just can’t stay away. After the Ford family vacation, Shannon went back to Nashville to pack for the first boyfriend family trip she has ever gone on (and it’s to Portugal?! Unreal). Shannon gives packing advice and her best tip on avoiding fights with family members on vacation. What happened when Shannon was seated at a wedding table with John? Which Very Cavallari cast member did she unexpectedly run into recently? Shannon talks about her trip itinerary and drops some breadcrumbs about next season. Who do you want to see on Probably A Podcast? Tell us! Season 3 coming soon!

item.title: Ep 29: Happy Gurliepop
item.itunes:title: Ep 29: Happy Gurliepop
item.description: Shannon just COULDN’T leave y’all hanging. Here is the *actual* final episode of season 2. Shannon rewinds to PB (Post-Barcelona) to give us updates on her life and new relationship. Since the last episode, she’s been to London not once, but twice, and she gives us details. Answering some popular questions, such as where she plans to live in the future, her tips for the "talking” stage, and figuring out long-distance relationships, Shannon opens up about her personal life and feelings for her new official boyfriend. So much smiling and good advice to hold you over until next season. Next time we see you, we’ll have those mic thingies. Be back soon!

item.title: Ep 28: Your Favorite Villains feat. Hannah Berner
item.itunes:title: Ep 28: Your Favorite Villains feat. Hannah Berner
item.description: It’s the season finale! Shannon sits down with amazing comedian and toe-positive queen, Hannah Berner, to chat (or have a heart-to-heart) about their time on reality tv. How do they really feel about being portrayed as the villain? Why did Hannah post a solo photo after her wedding? Do spray tans contain drugs? The girls talk about staying true to themselves and give some dating and relationship advice. Maybe by next season, Shannon will have a Cubs sponsorship. See ya then, this is episode 15.

item.title: Ep 27: Keeping up with Claudia Oshry
item.itunes:title: Ep 27: Keeping up with Claudia Oshry
item.description: Shannon and Claudia are absolutely obsessed with each other and here in NYC to declare it to the world. Live (lol not really) Preciously recorded from the iconic Toast Studio, the girls cover it all. They talk about the Oshry dog hierarchy and compare their lives growing up. Why did Shannon spend an extra week at camp? Who was Claudia’s first celebrity follower? How has Shannon not seen High School Musical? Ending this episode with an exciting announcement about the future of the podcast, buckle up toaster strudels. Listen to episode 14 to hear all the details.

item.title: Ep 26: Hoes on the Road feat. Summer Pardi
item.itunes:title: Ep 26: Hoes on the Road feat. Summer Pardi
item.description: Ask and you shall receive, Summer Pardi is here to tell her secrets of how the hell she stays so hot (jk, we wish). Summer and Shannon make their way around the conversation cul-de-sac: How did they meet? How does Summer like life on the road? How do the girls deal with hate on the internet? Shannon is stuck in MomTok and spending too much time on her phone. Summer apologizes for saying the F word and is having issues changing her name. Can anyone help her with that? Listen to their shenanigans in episode 13.

item.title: Ep 25: I Took A Pill in Ibiza (pt 2)
item.itunes:title: Ep 25: I Took A Pill in Ibiza (pt 2)
item.description: Did you actually think we weren’t going to use that for an episode title? Shannon and Marissa leave for Ibiza to get as rowdy as possible. Mission accomplished… or was it? Also wtf is a come-up? After quite the Ibiza club experience, another run in with a mouse, and lots of.. corn (?) the girls have to make a decision whether to go on to Seville as originally planned or head back to Barcelona to continue Shan’s fairytale. Will Shannon cross paths with Barcelona man again? Find out that and more in Episode 12!

item.title: Ep 24: Once upon a Barcelona (pt 1)
item.itunes:title: Ep 24: Once upon a Barcelona (pt 1)
item.description: Bitches luuuuv to travel abroad: Shannon and Marissa’s Europe Recap (well the first half of it). When Marissa told Shannon about her upcoming trip, one thing led to another, and all of the sudden Shannon was crashing her trip to Spain. What started as a normal, fun girls trip, quickly turned into what may be a fairytale? Who could be too sure. Join the girls through all the twists and turns and alleyways of Barcelona. Did Shannon meet her Prince Charming? Will they ever see each other again? What blast from the past was randomly on their flight to Ibiza with them? You’ll just have to listen this week (and next) to find out! An episode full of happiness, self reflection, and shockingly bad accents.

item.title: Ep 24: Manifesting and Makeup feat. Kelli Anne
item.itunes:title: Ep 24: Manifesting and Makeup feat. Kelli Anne
item.description: Shannon sits down with celebrity makeup artist and friend Kelli Anne to discuss a little bit of makeup, and a whole lot of everything else. How to navigate rejections and how to parlay them into following your passions, Kelli tells us about manifesting her life as an independent full time makeup artist in NYC. Shannon spills her best spray tan secrets, and tells us one of her big goals for the future. Does Oracle spray for roaches or hire life coaches? Shannon doesn’t know. What’s one of the girls biggest icks? Listen to Season 2 Episode 10 of Probably a Podcast to find out.

item.title: Ep 23: The Bedless Dutchman
item.itunes:title: Ep 23: The Bedless Dutchman
item.description: Another week, another podcast from a random part of Shannon’s living spaces. This week: her NYC apartment and (hopefully short-lived) inflatable chair. Shannon’s moving pod from Nashville gets delivered to NYC, but not before Dutch Man #2 spends the night. Bert saved the day (not all heroes wear capes, folks). Shannon’s bed is just soooo comfy… wait, did you just say study? Giggle through this little storytime with us on Season 2 Episode 9 of Probably A Podcast.

item.title: Ep 22: Code Names and Stovetops feat. Cassidy Lynn
item.itunes:title: Ep 22: Code Names and Stovetops feat. Cassidy Lynn
item.description: Shannon is finally getting settled into NYC, and is joined by one of her new friends, Cassidy Lynn. Cass is a celebrity stylist, but Shannon mainly wants to talk about one thing- boys/dating in the city. The pair find themselves locking eyes on the dance floor with two extremely tall men, and the rest is history (and by that, we mean we talk about it on this podcast). Did Glitz and Glam lead to love in a dark hopeless no cell service place? How many people do the girls keep on their roster at a time? How many different code names are mentioned during this episode? We actually lost track. Hockey? We dig it. Tampons, tampons, tampons. This is Season 2 Episode 8 of Probably a Podcast.

item.title: Ep 21: Dicked Down in the Desert
item.itunes:title: Ep 21: Dicked Down in the Desert
item.description: Shannon is riding solo this week to tell you all about her and AG’s Stagecoach shenanigans. Are you out here farting on planes? We really need to have a talk. Did someone ask for a Bridgerton update? Either way, here it is. Shannon is personally declaring her neighborhood a “No Blow Zone” (iykyk). From an almost missed flight to getting dicked down in the desert, hear about how it all went down in season 2 episode 7 of Probably a Podcast.

item.title: Ep 20: Probably a Fire Crotch feat. Taylor Monaco
item.itunes:title: Ep 20: Probably a Fire Crotch feat. Taylor Monaco
item.description: Back in Shannon’s kitchen for a life update with BFF, Taylor Monaco. They discuss Tay adjusting to having 2 babies now and how living basically next door to each other is going. The duo gives some advice on dating, cheating, and friendships. The girls read some spicy and gross confessions, and tell some of their own. They spill the tea on significant others and what their families really think about their social media presence. Ever clogged a toilet at a hookup's house? Do the carpets really match the drapes? Find out in Season 2 Episode 6 of Probably a Fire Crotch… oh shit, we mean Probably a Podcast.

item.title: Ep 19: Blockchella feat. AG
item.itunes:title: Ep 19: Blockchella feat. AG
item.description: Shannon and her new teeth are back with boof queen AG because, of course, the girls are going to give you a recap on their time at Coachella and the highly anticipated and talked about Revolve Festival. They give you the nitty-gritty about the festival and answer all your burning questions. Which famous influencer blocked Shannon? What happened when they ran into her? How did Shan attempt to apologize? What famous comedian alsooooo has her blocked? Shannon takes a drug then loses AG and the girls give you an update on Funny Guy and his dick skin... or lack thereof? Who knows - not Shannon. This and more in Episode 5 of Probably a Podcast - Blockchella

item.title: Ep 13: The Birthday Box
item.itunes:title: Ep 13: The Birthday Box
item.description: The girls head into the big city for Shannon's 28th trip around the sun. What starts as a pleasant experience drinking champagne and slurping down snails quickly escalates into what can only be described as... The Box. Anna Grace gives her predictions for Shannon's next season of life in 28 and where the streets might lead her. You'll learn what oddly specific rules AG has on her movie consumption, an important update on Bridgerton, and a VERY unlikely run in with a previous boss will have loyal listeners hanging on to every word in episode 13: The Birthday Box.

item.title: Ep 11: Soup Duped Dick Dumbed
item.itunes:title: Ep 11: Soup Duped Dick Dumbed
item.description: In this episode Shannon and AG give you insight to the highly anticipated Soup diet. Shannon breaks down what a “Horse Girl” is and her childhood memories of operating a mechanical bull at age 11. The girls dive in to what a sugar baby consists of and AG reveals her experience as one herself… allegedly? The streets have officially taken a sharp turn and Shannon is in need of Triple A. The girls discuss how to take your power back in a situation where you just feel confused. When is it appropriate to ghost someone, if ever? What salad was AG eating when she witnessed a homicide? All of these answers and more on Episode 11: “Soup Duped Dick Dumbed”

item.title: Ep 9: Therapy is Sexy feat. Jalen Noble
item.itunes:title: Ep 9: Therapy is Sexy feat. Jalen Noble
item.description: Welcome the first guest to Probably a Podcast: Jalen Noble. You might recognize him from Love Island, Tik Tok, or quite possibly just his abs in general. What the girls thought was going to be a sex filled podcast instead turned into a straight up EMOTIONAL knowledge atomic bomb. Jalen takes Shannon and AG to church on topics such as: Toxic masculinity, why therapy is cool, and how to validate your beginning, middle, and end of a breakup. Are we absolutely perplexed that someone as attractive as Jalen could also be this in touch with his emotions? Yes. Are we the problem because of that? Also yes. Tune into episode 9: THERAPY IS SEXY to learn more.

item.title: Ep 8: The Streets Don't Wait
item.itunes:title: Ep 8: The Streets Don't Wait
item.description: Episode 8 starts out with an apology for its delay but these streets wait for no one and Shannon is really in the throws of them. The girls discuss how AG nearly escapes death of the Gin variety and what sexual endeavors shouldn't be done while driving. Talking during sex? Into it. Talking to your penis out loud after sex? Ehhhh. Shannon has yet another Raya story but this one was less interested in her and more into her medical record. Which hit show's leading man did she cross paths with in New York? How to say F U to a man who belittles your career and which red flags they've experienced and fallen for in the past. All of this and more explained in "The Streets Don't Wait"

item.title: Ep 7: Guns n Lion Tattoos
item.itunes:title: Ep 7: Guns n Lion Tattoos
item.description: In today's episode Shannon is joined by Anna Grace once again to take you on another rollercoaster of fuckery. We update you on Shannon's dating life and the social media whoopsie she had over the weekend. The girls offer high praise to a Probably a Podcast listener who is out here absolutely grinding to be a match maker for Shannon in an unlikely turn of events. The girls discuss Anna Grace's Patreon launch and explain exactly why it will change your life to be a part of. They dive into how to have boundaries in friendships and relationships and not allowing someone else to write your story. Per usual Shannon will buy anything and forces AG into a medical fasting journey that absolutely nobody asked for... ever.  Did AG find herself wedged between a game of Russian roulette, a lion tattoo, and a handle of vodka? Find out all of this and more in Episode 7. "Are you ready to party????"

item.title: Ep 6: Sister Wives
item.itunes:title: Ep 6: Sister Wives
item.description: Today on the podcast we welcome Shannon's best friend: Taylor Monaco. The girls discuss how their friendship began, that one time they were on reality TV together and how to rip a 7am shot of tequila to save your bff's unborn child. Are you really even besties for the resties if you didn't get in a massive fight bc you wanted to sleep with your friends future husband?? Probably not. Shannon and Taylor break down how to navigate friendship when one of you is having babies and a mortgage and the other is nursing a hangover while she gets more tattoos. Did Taylor's husband star in an international porn with Stormi Daniels? Why did Shannon take a shot of Taylor's booze infused breast milk in Miami? You'll find out all of this and more in episode 6: Sister Wives.

item.title: Ep 5: Wig Burrito
item.itunes:title: Ep 5: Wig Burrito
item.description: This week the liquor store crush is reveled and it doesn't have a happy ending. The girls dive into new drugs involving amphibious creatures - and which members of the royal family have dabbled in them. Shannon talks her date out of a medical procedure and wonders if she's officially dating people too old for her. AG recounts a crisis involving her hair and the WIG BURRITO is born... and quickly killed. What happens when two girls walk into Bass Pro Shop when they absolutely don't belong there? AG gets naked that's what. You'll find out what terrible pickup lines Shannon throws to her Raya matches and how AG convinces her to be less mean to men. Why does everyone Shannon know's and loves all go to the same OBGYN and simultaneously end up on bed rest in one day? Lastly the girls discuss the horrifying act of submitting a stool sample and the poor FedEx worker who is in charge of shipping your shit. You read that correctly. Enjoy

item.title: Ep 4: Trip of a Lifetime
item.itunes:title: Ep 4: Trip of a Lifetime
item.description: In episode 4 we discuss AG’s intense (and hilariously terrible) journey in Sedona.. on mushrooms. You can gain some insight on what to do when your friends face melts off and get advice on how to avoid charges for rearranging landscape at 5 star resorts. Spoiler alert: AG has none for you. Is her bad trip worse than the time Shannon accidentally did meth? Who could be too sure. The girls explain their “Desperado scale” and how Shannon managed to reach an all time new high on it. Will she have to get the authorities involved in her liquor store crush?  Shannon gives the 411 on Malibu with Bridgerton and you’ll find out if she finally “gave those titties a chance” on another date now that it’s autumn. Stay in school and off drugs kids.

item.title: Ep 3: Hoes are Like Hobbies
item.itunes:title: Ep 3: Hoes are Like Hobbies
item.description: Episode 3 dives into Shannon's trip to New York and all the antics that went along with it. Anna Grace is back and boofin' about her school spirited nudes, quaalude-like illness, and her knowledge on footjobs. The girls discuss a time Shannon took her sexting talent too far and the difference between being ghosted or weasled. Is it irresponsible to be a horrible kisser when you're extremely hot? Can you guess what food they serve in the Memphis prison system? Does AG keep up with her cellmates from her brief stint in said prison? All of these questions and more are answered in this episode. It's almost cuffing season again and if you want a new hobby, give hoe's a try.

item.title: Ep 2: We Be Boofin'
item.itunes:title: Ep 2: We Be Boofin'
item.description: In episode 2 of Probably a Podcast Shannon has one of her best friends and the ever electric Anna Grace Newell joining her. No your podcast app didn't accidentally get switched into 4x faster speed that's just how alarmingly rapid Shannon and Anna Grace talk to each other on a regular basis. Was AG's car stolen 5 hours before this episode was recorded? Who could be too sure. Shannon dives into recent dates she's been on since her last complaint of no men talking to her post breakup. Strap in for discussions on fake accents, when to make a puke pallet palace, and their personal meaning behind "Boofin". Wondering when you should post a guy to your social media? Ever been in jail Tik Tok? Most importantly what season should your titties be given freedom? All of this and plenty more is answered in this Episode.
